page.title: 19EVENTS IN CADNAM AND BARTLEY
page.content:
An Edwardian garden party was held in the grounds of Bartley Cottage, Woodlands, on 6th July 1985, in aid of St. Mary's Church Fabric fund. There were stalls, sideshows, games and refreshments. An Arts and Crafts Exhibition was held in the Parish Hall on July 6th. On display were works by the children of the parish.
Bartley Horticultural Society held a plant sale on May 18th. at the Coach and Horses Hall. On July 5th a talk and demonstration on "Preparing for Show Day" was given.
Everyone enjoyed the Carnival, the first prize being awarded to the Copythorne Guides for their "Circus" float.
